title: Introducing Arcade
subtitle: By Wonder Sites
description: Embed interactive product demos in your documentation and turn all users into power users.

sections.text: Arcade lets you create interactive product demos in minutes and turn all users into power users. Let users experience your product through interactive, guided demos. No more pausing and rewinding, users can progress at their own pace. This integration allows you to embed Arcade interactive demos into your Wonder documentation.

Arcade is a powerful tool for creating interactive product demos. It allows you to Get a series of interactive steps that guide users through your product. You can embed these interactive demos directly into your Wonder documentation, making it easy for users to learn how to use your product.
Embedding an Arcade flow in your documentation is simple - just paste an Arcade flow link into the Wonder editor. The app will turn the link into an Arcade embed showing your recorded demo.
Arcade has revolutionized the way we provide user documentation.
To Create a free account with Arcade, you'll need to create an account and record your first demo. Once you've recorded your demo, you can embed it into your Wonder documentation.

To install on a single space navigate to integrations in sub-navigation. If you prefer to install the Arcade integration on multiple or all spaces, navigate to your organization settings and enable it from the integrations panel. This will give you access to the custom arcade block.
